oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Regioselective total synthesis of edulane and its angular analogue
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SUBBURAJ, K
MURUGESH, MG
TRIVEDI, GK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: 1,4-benzoquinones
pterocarpans
styrenes
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Herein we describe a 10-step total synthesis of edulane 3 and its angular analogue 18 from phloroglucinol. The key step involves ZnCl2-catalysed condensation of the appropriately substituted 2H-chromenes 8, 9 and 10 with the 2-alkoxy-1,4-benzoquinones 11 and 12, respectively.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY-PERKIN TRANSACTIONS 1, (12), 1875-1878
